name: Ohne dich
wikiSummary: Ohne dich (Without You) is a power ballad by Rammstein on their album Reise, Reise. It was released as the third single from the album on 22 November 2004 in Germany, Switzerland and Austria.  It is a song of lost love and follows a slow, even romantic ballad style. The central recurring theme is 'Without you, I cannot be, without you..., With you, I am also alone, without you...'
wikiText: Ohne dich (Without You) is a power ballad by Rammstein on their album Reise, Reise. It was released as the third single from the album on 22 November 2004 in Germany, Switzerland and Austria. It is a song of lost love and follows a slow, even romantic ballad style. The central recurring theme is 'Without you, I cannot be, without you..., With you, I am also alone, without you...'
